remarks: The derivative of a periodic function is periodic (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fperdvper.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> CC ) $.
fperdvper.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. RR ) $.
fperdvper.fper $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( F ` ( x + T ) ) = ( F ` x ) ) $.
fperdvper.g $e |- G = ( RR _D F ) $.
fperdvper $p |- ( ( ph /\ x e. dom G ) -> ( ( x + T ) e. dom G /\ ( G ` ( x + T ) ) = ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d F x $.
$d T x $.
$d T x $.
$d ph x $.
